channel.title: Comments on: Tableau 2012 politics contest – justification and making-of

item.title: By: Andy Cotgreave
item.dc:creator: Andy Cotgreave
item.description: Amazing stuff, Jerome. I always enjoy and appreciate your honesty about the pros and cons of Tableau. And this is another great post about some of the good and bad about TP. I also like your explanation of the motivations for your design choice. Really well done.
item.content:encoded: Amazing stuff, Jerome. I always enjoy and appreciate your honesty about the pros and cons of Tableau. And this is another great post about some of the good and bad about TP. I also like your explanation of the motivations for your design choice. Really well done.
